html: (7) To open the blind eyes.—The prophet must have felt the contrast between this and his own mission ( Isaiah 6:10). The words all point to spiritual blessings. (Comp. St. Paul’s call in Acts 26:18.) The “prison” is that of the selfishness and sin which hinder men from being truly free. In the “prisoners of hope” of Zechariah 9:11 , and the “spirits in prison” of 1 Peter 3:18 , we have different aspects of the same thought.
